texts: Each vehicle costs Â£10 a year to add to this account. The vehicle must be registered with the DVLA with a taxation class of 'recovery vehicle'. You can use vehicles already on your account or add new ones.
We do not hold details for this vehicle.
UK Registered: If your vehicle's make and model details have not been returned, make sure you entered the Vehicle Registration Mark correctly before continuing.
Registered outside the United Kingdom: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm this is the correct vehicle to continue.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the Congestion Charge, ULEZ charges and LEZ charges.
This may change at any time - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zones.
If you still want to register for a recovery vehicle discount you can continue.
This vehicle has already been added to your Apply for recovery vehicle discount list.
